name: GPT4TS
full_name: Frozen pre-trained language model for time series
paper: One Fits All: Power General Time Series Analysis by Pretrained LM
description: Unified framework that uses a frozen pre-trained language model that can be used for several types of time series analysis tasks, including time series classification, short/long-term forecasting, imputation, anomaly detection, few-shot and zero-sample forecasting.
bibtex: @inproceedings{zhou2023onefitsall,title={{One Fits All}: Power General Time Series Analysis by Pretrained LM},author={Tian Zhou, Peisong Niu, Xue Wang, Liang Sun, Rong Jin},booktitle={NeurIPS},year={2023}}
